alert.note: Alert for Fairfax; Prince William (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 9:02PM EDT until June 13 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Charles County in southern Maryland... South central Fairfax County in northern Virginia... Southeastern Prince William County in northern Virginia... * Until 945 PM EDT. * At 902 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake Ridge, or near Dale City, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Dale City, Woodbridge, Quantico, Lake Ridge, Montclair, Lorton, Triangle, Dumfries, Cherry Hill, Independent Hill, Bryans Road, Mason Neck, Potomac Heights, Marbury and Rison. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
